article:
See also Dance Dance Revolution (2010 video game)

Konami announced that [[Dance Dance Revolution (2009 video games)|Dance Dance
Revolution]] will feature at least 30 licensed songs along with their original
music videos and artwork, and at least 20 original tracks by Konami's in-house
musicians. It was also announced that there
would be at least 150 songs available as downloadable content for the
PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 versions at launch.
categories: Dance Dance Revolution soundtracks|Dance Dance Revolution (2009 video games)
